documents.title: safe stolen in oxford bakery robbery
text: between 01:30 and 06:20 on monday burglars smashed a glass panel in the front door of oxford bakery and cafe ltd in little clarendon street , police said .
they stole coins and a safe , which was later found broken into in walton lane .

documents.title: paedophile who fled to ireland sentenced
text: a paedophile who fled to ireland before a child sexual assault trial has been sentenced to 10 years and nine months in jail .
thomas nash , 70 , of fedamore , county limerick , was arrested in may 2015 of historical child sex offences which occurred between 1997 and 2001 .
when he failed to appear at court in may 2016 , a european arrest warrant was issued and he was extradited .
nash abused two girls aged four and seven at the time .
nash was convicted of five counts of indecent assault of a girl , and one count of gross indecency of a girl under the age of 16 .
he was initially arrested in oxford , and then sentenced at oxford crown court on tuesday .
the offences took place in bicester , oxfordshire and hampshire .

documents.title: pilot killed in aston rowant nature reserve crash named
text: a pilot killed when his light aircraft crashed in oxfordshire has been named .
david norris , 64 , from milton keynes , died at the scene when his plane crashed at aston rowant nature reserve at 14:35 on 15 january .
he had left turweston aerodrome in north buckinghamshire before he crashed .
an inquest into his death will be held on 1 february .
author: Sarah Lee
BBC South

documents.title: kitten cut free from peanut butter jar
text: kitten cut free from peanut butter jar

documents.title: cat gets head stuck in peanut butter jar
text: a kitten who got his head stuck in a jar of peanut butter while raiding a bin has been rescued .
the rspca was called after the six-month-old cat was found with his head completely stuck inside a plastic pot of peanut butter on land in tilbury lane , oxford , on saturday .
the black and white stray had frost covering its fur , and he could not move at all , the charity said .
inspectors cut away the plastic from the cat 's head to set it free .

documents.title: weather latest : cloudy and cold afternoon ahead
text: after a foggy start to the day , it is expected to gradually lift this afternoon .
however , it will remain cloudy and cold with temperatures dripping to 0c overnight .

documents.title: status quo to headline rewind festival
text: status quo are set to headline this year 's rewind festival in henley-on-thames .
the classic rock band , whose guitarist rick parfitt died last year , will be joined by the village people and gloria gaynor .

documents.title: duchess of cambridge congratulates oxford children 's hospital on 10th birthday
text: catherine , duchess of cambridge , has written this letter pledging her `` wholehearted support '' to the charity appeal for oxford children 's hospital 's 10th birthday .

lady baldry , chair of the appeal , said : `` we are thrilled to receive such special words of support from the duchess of cambridge which will mean so much to the staff and families at the oxford children 's hospital . ''

documents.title: good morning
text: good morning and welcome to oxfordshire live on wednesday .
the driving conditions may not have improved much , but at least we 're one day closer to friday !
today we 'll once again be bringing you news , sport , weather and travel from across the county until 18:00 .
you can tell us what 's going on in your area using twitter , by emailing us , or by sending us a message on facebook .
